title: Alguien habla ENGLSIH?
body:
{{summoner:17}} 
Busco gente que habla ingles para jugar con ellos.
I am seeking people who speak English to play with them.

Skype

replies.body: Yo hablo Frances....sirve?
mari mari PEÑI {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
sup , i think alot of ppl know speak english XD
shantai wikumuliken mai peñi in the window panay tipuliquen {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Mi libro Luna de Plutón ya está disponible todas las librerías de México, Argentina, Colombia, España, Ciudad Gótica, Silent Hill, Ciudad Peluche, Fondo de Bikini, Metrópolis,  el Vaticano, Mordor, Kandor, Patolandia, Pelotillehue, Macondo, Riverdale, Springfield, Buenas Peras, Hill Valley  y todos los lugares de habla hispana. Léelo sé que te va a encantar

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I can write english decently (at last people can understand what y wrote) but at the time of speaking im completly useless. I suppose its because i learned english by playing psx games a lot of years ago. The games in that time never cross the pacific ocean whit multi language set.
wat is you problem i spek englsih perfectium semd your invitaishon on mi perfiel ''xxxlawea777xxx''
Of course I can, that's why I study English Pedagogy, but I need someone to practice.
The amount of Engrish in this post is too damn high!
Why do you need people to talk english ?

some people just watch tv shows and learn english from them, it's funny, 'cause i learnt from comedies ^^
